import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get organization type by ID"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/organizations/types/{OrganizationTypeId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves a single organization type record by OrganizationTypeId. Use this endpoint to fetch full details for a type once you have an ID from a list or query response.

**Prerequisites**
1. **OrganizationTypeId** - Use [GET /api/v1.0/organizations/types/query](/docs/api/organizations/get-organization-types-by-query-get) and extract `Items[].OrganizationTypeId`.

**Workflow Example**
1. Query for organization types to get an ID.
2. Call [GET /api/v1.0/organizations/types/\{OrganizationTypeId\}](/docs/api/organizations/get-organization-type) to retrieve the full record.

**Minimal Required Fields**: OrganizationTypeId path parameter.

**Notes**: This API version is deprecated.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"OrganizationTypeId","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}

Null for global types."},"Scope":{"type":"string","enum":["Global","Site"],"description":"Scope of the organization type - Global or Site-specific."},"Name":{"type":"string","description":"Display name of the organization type."}},"title":"OrganizationType"},"IsSuccess":{"type":"boolean"},"Errors":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","description":"Standard error payload returned by the API when a request fails.","properties":{"StatusCode":{"type":"integer","description":"HTTP status code associated with the failure","example":401},"Message":{"type":"string","description":"Human-readable description of the error","example":"Attempted to perform an unauthorized operation."}},"required":["StatusCode","Message"],"title":"ErrorResponse"}}},"title":"OrganizationTypeItemResponse"},"example":{"Item":{"OrganizationTypeId":"a1b2c3d4-e5f6-4a5b-8c9d-0e1f2a3b4c5d","CreatedDate":"2025-01-15T10:30:00Z","ModifiedDate":"2025-01-15T10:30:00Z","IsDeleted":false,"SiteId":null,"Scope":"Global","Name":"Conference Center"},"IsSuccess":true,"Errors":[]}}}}}}
>
